Text: Which tool is used for creating dependencies between configuration items in the CMDB?
wpProQuiz_correct: CI Relationship Editor is the tool typically used for creating dependencies between Configuration Items (CIs) in a CMDB (Configuration Management Database).

The relationship doesn‘t involve parent-child roles
The base CI will be the parent CI
The base CI will be the child CI

Text: Which application is used primarily to load data into ServiceNow?
wpProQuiz_correct: System Import Sets is the primary application used to load data into ServiceNow. It allows you to import data from various sources, such as CSV files, XML files, and other systems, into ServiceNow tables.

wpProQuiz_correct: FALSE

Text: ServiceNow provides customers with a dedicated database, application and data isolation using which one of the following models ?
wpProQuiz_correct: ServiceNow provides customers with a dedicated database, application, and data isolation using a single-tenant model.

Text: When importing data from a spreadsheet, which step defines where the incoming data columns will be written in the receiving table?
wpProQuiz_correct: ✅ E. Create Transform Map: This is the correct option. In ServiceNow, creating a transform map is the step where you define how the incoming data columns from a spreadsheet will be mapped to the receiving table. A transform map specifies the relationship between the fields in the import set (staging table) and the fields in the target table, ensuring that data is correctly placed in the receiving table.

Text: Which plugin needs to be activated in order to translate the content of catalog item to multiple languages ?
wpProQuiz_correct: The correct answer is B. Localization framework plugin (com.glide.localization_framework).

wpProQuiz_correct: Answer: D. Provide common notification content

Text: Which fields can be configured in reporting to perform arithmetic, coalesce, concatenation and length ?
wpProQuiz_correct: Answer: C. Function fields
